thread.title: 'She is awful!' The One Show host Angela Scanlon slammed for rudely interrupting Emma Willis mid-sentence

title: 'She is awful!' The One Show host Angela Scanlon slammed for rudely interrupting Emma Willis mid-sentence

organizations.name: facebook follow us on twitter celebs newsletter follow @mirrortv subscribe

text:
'She is awful!' The One Show host Angela Scanlon slammed for rudely interrupting Emma Willis mid-sentence The Celebrity Big Brother star didn't look impressed   Share   Comments By Nicola Agius 22:03, 17 FEB 2017 TV Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch Next Nicki di Marco in her Eastenders days Watch this video again Watch Next Stars flock to Gorden Kaye's funeral to pay tribu 0:30 Little Mix's Jesy Nelson debuts her new 'do on In 0:38 Britney Spears' niece Maddie's miraculous recover 0:40 Internet star dropped by YouTube over 'anti-Semit 0:42 Actress accidentally reveals her boobs during a L 0:20 Tearful Ashton Kutcher breaks down during powerfu 1:22 Jamie O'Hara causes a SPLASH in Dubai 0:29 Winning lottery number for Friday February 21 Google project to beam internet to Earth from gia 2:49 Man tells news reporter his name is 'Mike Litoris' 0:33 David Brent's iconic dance 0:26 Incident caught on camera 1:24 Big Benefits Handout family disgusted after NHS s 1:21 Rhian Sugden gives cheeky smile as she gets Brazi 0:32 Video will play in  Emma Willis looks furious as she's cut off mid story Share this video Watch Next   Share   Comments Get celebs   Emma Willis had a rude encounter on The One Show this evening. 
She was a guest on tonight's episode to talk about the upcoming Brit Awards, which she is hosting next week.
However, she looked less than impressed half way though her interview with Angela Scanlon and Ore Oduba as she was rudely interrupted. 
When asked what her favourite sweet, she started to tell a personal story about her grandad.
Emma Willis had a rude encounter on The One Show (Photo: BBC) She said: " "Well one of my all time favourites – because my grandad always had a jar of them in his house and I would literally eat the whole bowl…"
Read More Matt Willis Busted Valentine's Day for wife Emma by accidentally throwing a huge party Before she could finish the sentence, Angela then interjected and said: "We'll come back to that."
Emma didn't look at all impressed and let out a "Oh!"
Meanwhile, Ore looked on in shock as he tried to register what had just happened.
He then awkwardly to play down the awkward incident by quipping to Emma: "You tease!"
Angela Scanlon interrupted her famous guest mid-sentence (Photo: BBC) Unsurprisingly, the exchange didn't escape the notice of those tuning in at home, with viewers quick to take to Twitter afterwards.
One wrote: "Erm, wasn't Emma Willis mid-flow then? Strange #TheOneShow".
Another then posted: "Awkwardly ask a guest something only to rudely interrupt them & go to a recording".
Emma didn't look impressed afterwards (Photo: BBC) Moments later, a different viewer commented: "This female presenter is just awful! Completely cut Emma off," a third account commented."
Shortly afterwards, another tweeted: "Well that was very awkward!@BBCTheOneShow @EmmaWillis I want to hear the story about your Grandad!".
*The One Show is on BBC One, weekdays at 7pm
